text: Ray Lonnen (18 May 1940 – 11 July 2014) was an English stage and television actor. His most famous roles include Willie Caine in the cold-war spy drama series The Sandbaggers (1978–80) and also as Harry Brown in the television miniseries Harry's Game (1982). Lonnen died on 11 July 2014 from cancer, aged 74.My dear husband @RayLonnen has passed away peacefully today after a 3 year tussle with cancer; twitter.com; accessed 12 July 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== * * "The Sandbaggers" OpsRoom.org; accessed 12 July 2014.
